promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple bull electric-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltoroan, a a chibi young simple bull electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Tapu Thunder-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "electric" or "Voltoroan". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, bull-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: City-dwelling and playful, this bovine creature sends shockwaves of youthful energy with Tapu Thunder-GX. Awe-inspiring and energetic.
